0.author: Thomas Paine
0.quote: He who is the author of a war lets loose the whole contagion of hell and opens a vein that bleeds a nation to death.

1.author: John Wooden
1.quote: Be interested in finding the best way, not in having it your way.

2.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
2.quote: When art dresses in worn-out material it is most easily recognized as art.

3.author: Groucho Marx
3.quote: Before I speak, I have something important to say.

4.author: George Burns
4.quote: At my age flowers scare me.
